text:
e="preserve">Allama Nur Hossain Kasemi () (10 January 1945 — 13 December 2020) was a Bangladeshi Deobandi Islamic scholar, politician, educator, religious speaker and spiritual figure. He was the Secretary General of Hefazat-e-Islam Bangladesh from November 2020 until his death. He also was in charge of Jamiat Ulema-e-Islam Bangladesh from 2015 until his death. Kasemi was born in Dhaka.
Kasemi died at a Dhaka hospital on 13 December 2020 from respiratory failure, aged 75.
